instruments: Gravity Harp (plays based on planetary alignment)
Harmonica of the Winds (controls weather patterns)
Light Lute (produces melodies of pure light)
Pan Pipes of the Wild (summons animal spirits)
Soul Drum (beats in sync with a person's life force)
Spectral Organ (plays sounds from other dimensions)
Talking Drums (communicate complex messages through rhythm)
Temporal Gong (can send sound back or forward in time)
Vibroblade (sword that vibrates with sonic energy)
Void Flute (silences all sound in an area)
Whispering Lyre (plays secrets only the listener can hear)
Xeno Harp (plays music from alien cultures)
